name: The Space Bar (itch)
description:
Dad, how was space created?

features:

  • a non existing genre: point&space adventure
  • multiple EXTREMELY meaningful endings
  • amazing soundtrack (but you don’t hear it as it is playing inside the spacebar)
  • clever puzzles for clever people
  • 100% organic and gluten free pixels
  • mysterious cat
  • is this art?!
